title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\V2\Family
name: Family
description:
Specifies (some of) the contents of a single row/column family intersection of a table.

Generated from protobuf message google.bigtable.v2.Family

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The unique key which identifies this family within its row. This is the same key that's used to identify the family in, for example, a RowFilter which sets its "family_name_regexfilter" field. Must match `[-.a-zA-Z0-9]+`, except that AggregatingRowProcessors may produce cells in a sentinel family with an empty name. Must be no greater than 64 characters in length.

params.name: data.columns
params.description: Must not be empty. Sorted in order of increasing "qualifier".

methods.name: getName
methods.description:
The unique key which identifies this family within its row. This is the same key that's used to identify the family in, for example, a RowFilter which sets its "family_name_regex_filter" field.

Must match [-_.a-zA-Z0-9]+, except that AggregatingRowProcessors may produce cells in a sentinel family with an empty name. Must be no greater than 64 characters in length.

Generated from protobuf field string name = 1;
